import '../styles/Profile.css' import '../styles/Posts.css' import like from '../assets/Icons/like.png' import dislike from '../assets/Icons/dislike.png' import pen from '../assets/Icons/pen.webp' import { useState, useEffect, useRef, useCallback } from 'react' import {GetProfile,GetProfilePosts} from '../services/profiles.service' import {Comments} from './Comments' export const Profile = () =>{ const [profile, setProfileInfos] = useState([]); const [posts, setProfilePosts] = useState([]); const editMainInfosElement = () useEffect(() => { GetProfile() .then(data => setProfileInfos(data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, []) useEffect(() => { GetProfilePosts() .then(data => setProfilePosts(data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, []) let postsElement = (
    {posts.map((post) =>

  • {post.userId}

    {post.content}

    {post.likes}

    {post.dislikes}

    handleClick(post._id,e)}>comments
    • )}
) if(posts.length == 0){ postsElement =

No posts yet

} return (

{profile.firstname} {profile.lastname}

{profile.description}

{postsElement}
) } const handleClick = (id,e) => { e.preventDefault(); let x = document.getElementById("comments-"+id); if (x.style.display === "none") { x.style.display = "block"; } else { x.style.display = "none"; } }
